SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, RI.REGULATION_NO AS REGULATIONNO, RI.REGULATION_TITLE AS REGULATIONTITLE, RI.REGULATION_CONTENTS AS REGULATIONCONTENTS, RI.REGULATION_VIEW_CNT AS REGULATIONVIEWCNT, RI.REG_MEMBER_NO AS REGMEMBERNO, DATE_FORMAT(RI.REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS REGDT, RI.CHG_MEMBER_NO AS CHGMEMBERNO, RI.CHG_DT AS CHGDT, FI.FILE_NO AS REGULATIONFILENO, FI.FILE_ORG_NAME AS REGULATIONFILEORGNAME, FI.FILE_NAME AS REGULATIONFILENAME, FI.FILE_PATH AS REGULATIONFILEPATH, P.PAGE AS PAGE, MI.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBERID FROM REGULATION_INFO RI INNER JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON RI.REG_MEMBER_NO = MI.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON RI.REGULATION_FILE_NO = FI.FILE_NO, (SELECT COUNT(*) AS PAGE FROM REGULATION_INFO RI INNER JOIN MEMBER_INFO MI ON RI.REG_MEMBER_NO = MI.MEMBER_NO
INSTR(RI.REGULATION_TITLE, #{search}) > 0 OR INSTR(MI.MEMBER_ID, #{search}) > 0
INSTR(RI.REGULATION_TITLE, #{search}) > 0
INSTR(MI.MEMBER_ID, #{search}) > 0
) P, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R
INSTR(RI.REGULATION_TITLE, #{search}) > 0 OR INSTR(MI.MEMBER_ID, #{search}) > 0
INSTR(RI.REGULATION_TITLE, #{search}) > 0
INSTR(MI.MEMBER_ID, #{search}) > 0
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{splitPage}
